function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"No work in the existing literature reviewing the role of emerging technologies in managing the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Historical pandemics and their impact on humankind","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of disease from birds to humans","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of young and healthy individuals to h1n1 virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continued evolution and mutation of influenza viruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of new strains of influenza virus leading to pandemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 with distinct stages of transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sporadic cases of covid-19 leading to local transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clusters of covid-19 cases with unknown transmission source","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community transmission leading to large outbreaks and high number of incidents and deaths","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid outbreak of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stringent lockdown measures in automotive industry","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Factory shutdowns impacting automobile production","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive impact on aviation industry due to travel bans","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in demand for new aircraft purchases","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 causing a decline in international visitor arrivals and tourism receipts","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drastic decline in global oil demand due to shutdown of international and domestic passenger aircraft","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe disruptions and delays in construction projects due to workforce unable to work as a result of stringent development.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on the food industry, including closure of restaurants, cafes, and luxury food service providers, and difficulty meeting rising demands due to panic buying.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of ventilators, icus, and ppe in hospitals","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive increase in network bandwidth consumption","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive drop in share prices of testing.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to distinguish covid-19 symptoms from common flu, leading to challenges in determining testing
